ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: As a key member of the Sensing Device team, you will be responsible for semiconductor laser design and working with suppliers to bring up new optoelectronic devices with good performance and yields, work with operations engineering on yield issues, work with suppliers on process development to enable next generation sensing technologies.

ul.li: 5+ years semiconductor laser design and simulation experience
Hands-on experience in VCSEL or edge-emitting laser EPI structure design and simulation
Strong device physics and optoelectronics device modeling background, including electrical and optical simulation/modeling
Strong programing and data analysis skills
Experience on MOCVD or MBE EPI growth, III-V semiconductor process, optoelectronic device layout design and characterization is a plus
Excellent analytical and problem solving skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work closely with others in a very cross-functional team environment

div.p: Core Responsibilities: VCSEL or edge-emitting semiconductor laser design and simulation Semiconductor laser EPI design, simulation and characterization Setting semiconductor laser process flow and device specifications, supporting manufacture, test and qualification Working with suppliers on new optoelectronic device development, performance and yield improvement, and reliability qualification
MS/PhD in electrical engineering, physics, or a similar discipline
